title: Calories in a Matcha Latte
meta_description: Discover calories in a matcha latte, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for different milks.
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) whole milk, 1 tsp (2 g) matcha powder, steamed/frothed, no added sweeteners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, matcha quality, serving size, and additions like syrups. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard matcha latte provides about 160 kcal with 9 g protein from the milk.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole

faqs.q: How many calories in a matcha latte with whole milk?
faqs.a: About 160 kcal for an 8 oz serving with 1 tsp matcha.

faqs.q: Is a matcha latte low carb?
faqs.a: It has around 13 g carbs, mostly from milk; opt for low-carb milk to reduce.

faqs.q: What about protein in a matcha latte?
faqs.a: Typically 9 g from whole milk; plant-based milks vary.
Yes, about 70 mg from 1 tsp matcha, similar to green tea.

faqs.q: How to make a lower calorie matcha latte?
faqs.a: Use non-dairy milk like almond or oat, and skip sweeteners for under 100 kcal.
